valueExpression.name: other-qs-positive
valueExpression.expression: (%down.code = 'several-days' or %down.code = 'more-than-half' or %down.code = 'nearly-every-day' or %nervous.code = 'several-days' or %nervous.code = 'more-than-half' or %nervous.code = 'nearly-every-day' or %restless.code = 'several-days' or %restless.code = 'more-than-half' or %restless.code = 'nearly-every-day') and %qs-incomplete-q1-to-q3 = false

valueExpression.name: alcohol-how-much-by-gender
valueExpression.expression: iif(%biological-gender = 'male', %alcohol-how-much.code = '5-or-6' or %alcohol-how-much.code = '7-to-9' or %alcohol-how-much.code = '10-or-more', %alcohol-how-much.code = '3-or-4' or %alcohol-how-much.code = '5-or-6' or %alcohol-how-much.code = '7-to-9' or %alcohol-how-much.code = '10-or-more')

valueExpression.name: no-mental-problem
valueExpression.expression: %down.code = 'not-at-all' and %restless.code = 'not-at-all' and %alcohol.code = 'never' and %alcohol-how-much.code = '1-or-2' and %drug.code = 'never' and %thought.code = 'no' and %harm.code = 'no' and %strange.code = 'no' and %voice.code = 'no' and %dead.code = 'no' and %kill.code = 'no' and %end.code = 'no'

valueExpression.name: dont-know
valueExpression.expression: %alcohol.code = 'dont-know' or iif(%alcohol-how-much.code.exists(), %alcohol-how-much.code = 'dont-know', false) or %drug.code = 'dont-know' or %thought.code = 'dont-know' or %harm.code = 'dont-know' or %strange.code = 'dont-know' or %voice.code = 'dont-know' or %dead.code = 'dont-know' or %kill.code = 'dont-know' or %end.code = 'dont-know'

item.text: The Mental Wellness Tool aims to catch as many people with mental health problems as possible, even if it means that there might be some people who in the end don’t have the disorder that they screened positive for (false positives). This approach reduces the chance of missing anyone who has mental health problems.

Proceed only if the client has no acute medical or psychiatric issues that could require immediate clinical attention – for example:
  •  being intoxicated
  •  being confused
  •  disorganized thinking
  •  unable to communicate or sit down for a period
  •  looks very medically ill
taskId of common mental health form

Tip #1
The Mental Wellness Tool (mwTool) is a brief survey that screens for severe mental disorders (including psychosis and mania), common mental disorders (including depression, anxiety, and post-traumatic disorder), alcohol use disorders, and suicide risk.

Tip #2
Note that the Mental Wellness Tool is a screening tool, so its results are not diagnostic. Use the tool to better understand the client's problems and determine next steps, but do not provide definite diagnoses (e.g., "you are diagnosed with alcohol use disorder").
I would like to ask you a few questions so we can figure out together what you are dealing with. The following 3 questions ask about your experience in the past two weeks.

item.text: • The client shows no signs of any mental health problems

Based on the determination of the supervisor, either:
  •  Go back and fill out the Mental Wellness Tool questions which have incomplete answers or;
  •  Write down what the supervisor recommended for this client or the reasons for terminating the session, and end the screening process.
